data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Evenhuis, Neal L., Gang, Yao (2016): Review of the Oriental and Palaearctic bee fly genus Euchariomyia Bigot (Diptera: Bombyliidae: Bombyliinae). Zootaxa 4205 (3): 211-225, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.3.2|70 occurrences
